images.mining.segmentation

Class SRMSegmentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • images.mining.segmentation.SRMSegmentation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SegmentationInterface

    public class SRMSegmentation
extends java.lang.Object
implements SegmentationInterface
    This class implements the statistical region merging segmentation algorithm and the code is heavily based on an applet created by Frank Nielsen and Richard Nock.

        Description copied from interface: SegmentationInterface
        Obtain the current image segmentation.
        Specified by:
        getSegmentation in interface SegmentationInterface
        Returns:
